algorithm_technique: Greedy approach tracking the maximum reachable index
problem_summary_simple: Determine if you can reach the last index of an array by jumping.
problem_summary_technical: Greedily track the farthest reachable index, breaking if current index exceeds it.
key_insights: The problem can be solved greedily by always trying to reach as far as possible.
Maintain a variable `reachable` that stores the maximum index that can be reached so far.
If the current index `i` ever exceeds `reachable`, it means we cannot proceed further.
